titleStmt.title: SII 7.1047: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1047. (A.R. No. 414 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Iruṉila maṭan=taiyum poṟceyap pāvai yum cīrttaṉiṟ celviyu n=taṉ perun=teviyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutiya luḻiyu ḷiṭaituṟaināṭu n=tuṭarvanavelip paṭar vanavāciyuñ cuḷḷicūḻ matiḷ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumuraṇ maṇṇaikaṭakkamum porukaṭa liḻattaraicar tam muṭiyum Āṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyum muṉṉavarpakkaṟ ṟeṉṉavar vaitta cun=taramuṭiyum In=tiraṉ Āramu n=taṇṭirai Īḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟipaṭaik keraḷar muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kulatanamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatirve
lai tolperuṅkāvaṟ palpaḻan=ti vil ceruvil cinavi lirupattorukāl Aracukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāman melvaruñ cān=timattivaraṇ karuti Iruttiya compoṟ tiruttakumuṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika muyaṅkiyil mutukiṭṭoḷitta cayaciṅkaṉ Aḷapperum pukaḻoṭu piṭiyi liraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiilakkamum navanetikkulap perumalaikaḷum vikkiramavīra cakkarakoṭṭamum mutirvaṭavallai maturamaṇṭalamuṅ kāmiṭaiyvaḷa nāmaṇaikkoṇaiyum veñcilai vīrar pañcappaḷḷiyum pārcaṭaippaḻaṉa mācuṇitecamum Ayarvil vaṇpū
rtti Ā vaiyiṟ can=ti raṉtolkulat tin=tirarataṉai viḷaiyamaṟkaḷattu kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittu palatanattoṭu niṟaikulatanakkuvaiyum kiṭṭaruñ ceṭimuḷai Oṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcurar cer nalk kocalaināṭu n=taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟaicolai taṇṭaputtiyi liraṇacūraṉai muraṇukat tākkit tik=kaṇaikirtti takkaṇalāṭamum kovin=tacan=tan māviḻin=toṭat taṅkātacāral vaṅkāḷatecamum toṭukaṭaṟ caṅkukoṭṭaṉ mayipālaṉai veñcamarviḷākat tañcuvittaruḷi Oṇṭiṟal yāṉaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nittala
neṭuṅkaṭa luttaralāṭamum veṟimalar tirttatteṭuṟi puṉaṟ kaṅkaiyum Alaikaṭal naṭuvil palakalam celutticaṅkirāmavijaiyottuṅkavanmaṉākiya kiṭārattaraicaṉai kayam porukaṭal kumpakkariyoṭum Akappaṭap piṭit turimaiyil piṟanta perun=ti piṟakkamum Āttavaṇaknakar porttuḻil vācalil viccātiratoraṇamum moyttoḷir puṉaimaṇi putavamum kaṉamaṇik katavamum niṟaicirvicaiyamum tuṟainīr paṉmaiyu maṉmalaiyūraiyil toṉmalai yūrum Aḻkaṭal Akaḻ cūḻ māyiruṭiṅkamum kalaṅkāvalviṉaiilaṅkātecāpa
mum kāppuṟu niṟaipunal māpappāḷamum kāvalampuricai mevalipaṅkamum viḷaippan=tūṟuṭai vaḷaippan=tūṟum kalaittakkor pukaḻ talaittakkolamum tittamāvalviṉai mātamāliṅkamum teṉaikkalarpoḻil mānakkavāramum toṭupaṭaṟ kāval kaṭumuṟaṭk kiṭāramum māpperu n=taṇṭāl koṇṭa kopparakecaripanmarāna Uṭaiyār śrīrājen=tiracoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu Irupattiraṇṭāvatu jeyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kāliyūrkoṭṭattu kāḻiyūrṉāṭṭu Ākkūūrom muṭivilaiāvaṇak kaiyyeḻuttu
Ikkoṭṭattu pākūrnāṭṭu nakaram vikkiramacoḻapurattu kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻaīśvara muṭaiyārkku Iṟaiyili tevatāṉamāka Ātidāsacaṇṭeśvaratevarkku Eṅkaḷūr nilattil nāṅkaḷ tevatānamāka viṟṟukkuṭukkiṟa nilam kiḻpāṟkellai nāṅkaḷ naṭṭa kallukku mekkum tenpārkkellai Āṟṟaṅkarai kollaikku vaṭakkum mel
pālkellai miyaṟṟupākkattu nilattukkum puṟṟuraipākkattu nilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai vik=kiramāparaṇacaturvvetimaṅkalat=tu Eṟikku pāyn=ta vāyk=kāluk=ku teṟkum Āka nāṟpālellaik=kum naṭuvupaṭṭa nilam mikitikuṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅka patinaṟucāṇkolāl kuḻi Āṟāyiramum ceyyāṟṟaṅkaraik=ku vaṭak=kum melpālkellai miyaṟa
ṟupākkat tellaikku kiḻakku vaṭapāṟkellai nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta pūmikku teṟkum kiḻpāṟkellai kaliñcuviṭṭukku meṟku kollainilam patinaṟucāṇkolāl kuḻi Āṟāyiramum mikitikuṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅka Āka kuḻi paṉnirāyiramum Emmilicaain=ta vilaipporuḷ Aṟakkoṇṭu candrādittavaṟ Iṟaiyiliditevatā
namāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom Irukālāvatum mukkālāvatum viṟṟukkuṭuttom Ākkūr Ūrom vikkiramacoḻapurattu kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻaĪśvaramuṭaiyār Ādidāsacaṇḍeśvaradevark=ku Iṟaiyili tevatānamāka ṉāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta pūmikku tirukoṟṟavācalāl pon=ta kuṭimai Epperpaṭṭa kuṭimaiyum nāṅ
kaḷe Iṟuppatākavum Innilam cuṭṭi Uḻaviṟai Eccoṟṟu kūṟṟunel veṭṭi Amañci Epperpaṭṭa Iṟai kāṭṭappeṟātomākavum Eṅkaḷ Ūr periyaeri talainirum kaṭainirum pāccikoḷḷappeṟuvatākavum Ippaṭi Icaiñcu Iṟaiyili tevatānamāka vikkirama
tidāsacaṇḍeśvaradevarkku Iṟaiyili tevatānamāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom Ākkūr Ūrom Itaṟṟiṟampil tanmāsanamutalāka tāṉ veṇṭun kovuk=ku nittam Aiṅkaḻañcu poṉ maṉṟappeṟuvatākavum Ippūmi Aḻivupaṭāmai celuttuvomāka Icai
Digital edition of SII 7.1047 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
